Real Name: Kuan-Yin Xorn
Special Powers
GRAVITY WELL: Plasticity, KNOCKBACK. // When Xorn knocks back an opposing character, reverse the direction of knock back (they are knocked towards him).
EVENT HORIZON: Energy Shield/Deflection, Toughness. // Opposing characters within 4 squares and line of fire must break away as if they were adjacent to Xorn.
